Municipal Court
---------------

### City of Elsa Municipal Court

**Hours of Operation**

The City of Elsa Municipal Court is open **Monday through Friday, from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.**

Defendants may also submit a **written plea** via email or fax to the Court.

Online payment options, drop box payments, and other arrangements may be available. Please note that **certain citations are not eligible for online payment** and must be scheduled for an appearance before the Judge.

For additional information or assistance, please contact the Municipal Court office.

### 

### Payment of Fines

The City of Elsa Municipal Court accepts the following forms of payment **in person or by mail. Mail Box P.O. Box 427. All money orders must be payable to Elsa Municipal Court.**

 

* Money orders
* Credit cards
* Debit cards

Payments may also be **processed over the phone $3 convenience** **fee**

#### Online Payments

 Online payments are available through our payment portal.

If you are unable to process your payment online, payments may be submitted by **money order** using the court drop box located at:

**216 E. 4th (VFW) Street**   
**Elsa, Texas**

Please ensure that **your DOB and Citation number** is included with **any payment** placed in the drop box. Payments submitted without this information **will not be processed** and will be returned by mail.

**Do not place cash in the drop box.**

We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your cooperation.

[Pay here](https://www.paymentservicenetwork.com/PaymentPage.aspx?acc=RT24052)

![](//img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/4148a21f-befb-4d56-9c27-a422282a6a9e/blob-a6231cf.png/:/cr=t:24.93%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:50.15%25/rs=w:600,h:451.12781954887214,cg:true)

#### Presiding Judge

*Eliazar "Eli" Rodriguez*

216 E. 4th **(**VFW**)** St. Elsa Tx. 78543

(956)262-9866

(956)262-2632 fax
